MotionMetering.comment_smoothFactor: smooth current motion and previous motion
MotionMetering.comment_mdLocalTh: threshold to classify current loacal motion
MotionMetering.coment_mdGlobalTh: threshold to classify current global motion
MotionMetering.comment_mdConfirmTh: threshold to finally judgement wheather obj moves
MotionMetering.comment_softThresMotion: soft threshold to pixel motion, in (0.0,4.0)
MotionMetering.comment_pmmPredictMethod: 0: equal current frame motion 1:mean of previous avgFrameNum frame motion 2:GMM(Gaussian Mixture Mode), 3: kalman filter
MotionMetering.comment_avgFrameNum: num of frame in mean method(pmmPredictMethod=1) to predict motion
MotionMetering.comment_iterConvergence: num of iteration in GMM method(pmmPredictMethod=2) to predict motion, in [250,1000]
MotionMetering.comment_gmmClusterNum: num of cluster in GMM method(pmmPredictMethod=2) to predict motion
MotionMetering.comment_gmmFrameNum: num of frame in GMM method(pmmPredictMethod=2) to predict motion
MotionMetering.comment_gmmConf: confidence to get one clear frame at least in next gmmKFrameK frame in GMM method
MotionMetering.comment_gmmKFrame: num of capturing frame for using
MotionMetering.comment_kalmanQ_kalmanR: kalman predict param Q and R
MotionMetering.comment_enableDump: dump motion marked frame, only in WIN32
MotionMetering.comment_gyrot0_and_gyrot1: phoneMotionMode, take gyro data from gyro0 seconds to gyrot1 before current frame
MotionMetering.comment_tripodThresh_and_sportThresh: gyro threshold to classify tripod and handle
MotionMetering.comment_gyroNumPerSecond: input max num of gyro per second, eg: preview max 30fps, process 1 frame per 4 frames, every time 40 gyro, the gyroNumPerSecond is 30fps/4*40 = 300
MotionMetering.comment_motionClassifyThresh: threshold to classify motion, this param should match skip frame number
MotionMetering.comment_motionSmoothRate: the rate of smoothing the current motion and previous motion, in (0.0, 1.0). 1.0 means totally depending on current motion
MotionMetering.comment_motionPercent: select strongest percent grid to classify motion mode
MotionMetering.comment_defaultMotion: if enableBaypass = 1, 1: motion mode 0: no obj motion
MotionMetering.comment_lowLight: combine gyro and motion low light point
MotionMetering.comment_highLight: combine gyro and motion high light point
MotionMetering.comment_gyroMag: gyro coefficient to match motion in magnitude
MotionMetering.comment_focalLength_gyro: calibration data for specific device, do not change once calibrated
MotionMetering.comment_alignMethod: alignMethod: 0: check phoneMode only, 1: align off, 2: LK optical flow; 3: gyro; 4: discrete gyro; 5: de-rolling-shutter; 6: LK optical flow calibrated by gyro and ois
MotionMetering.comment_localMvStatMethod: method of calculating local Mv, 0: average, 1: percentage
MotionMetering.comment_tocalMvStatMethod: method of calculating local Mv, 0: average, 1: percentage
MotionMetering.comment_globalMvLevelThresh: Level threshold of global motion - homogarphy
MotionMetering.comment_totalMvLevelThresh: Level threshold of local motion average
MotionMetering.comment_localMvLevelThresh: motion threshold of local motion for motion statistic
MotionMetering.comment_enable: enable motion level thresh controlled by json param
